sourcesContent:
<script>
import axios from 'axios';

export default {
    props: ['url'],
    date() {
        return {
            response: null,
            loading: true,
        }
    },
    created() {
        axios.get(this.url)
        .then(response => {
            console.log(response);
            this.response = response.data;
            this.loading = false;
        })
        .catch(error => {
            alert('[ERROR] fetching the data', error);
            console.log(error);
        });
    },
    render() {
        return this.$slots.default({
       //return this.$scopedSlots.default({
            a: this.response,
            b: this.loading,
        });
    },
}
</script>
